item.description:
Let's get together for a stress free and relaxing afternoon. Everyone is welcomed to bring an
item(s) to contribute or bring your own lunch. This is private event members and invited guests, Please RSVP


2pm - 6pm

We'll gather at the large grassy/shaded area at the park entrance near the main parking lot across from the playground and snack shack. Bring your own chair.

Rain date is the next day Sunday 7/18/10 at 2pm

If you have any questions, regarding the picnic you can email Eleanore or Barbara (Event Hostess).

Hope to see everyone there. (this is a private event, for our members only).

Barbara and Eleanore

This event is hosted by The Original Steppers of Boston Inc 2006 committee

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: 3rd ANNUAL SUMMER PICNIC July 17th - 2pm
